channel.title: Isaac's Online Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Isaac's Online Portfolio

item.title: Applied Ballistics
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: AppliedBallistics iPhone iTunes Link Features Ballistic Simulation Forms Screen Shots Product Description State of the art ballistic solver for calculating long range rifle trajectories. This solver and the library of ballistic coefficients is provided by Bryan Litz and is the most accurate and complete ballistics app available.

item.title: Arcat
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: Arcat Android & iPhone iTunes Link Features REST API PDF Viewer Image Caching Video Player RSS Feed Screen Shots Product Description The ARCAT app helps architects, engineers and contractors in the productivity of the design build process, from design to construction to facility management. ARCAT has the most extensive and up to date building product information including libraries for CAD Details, BIM content and specifications.

item.title: AssistFund
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: AssistFund iPhone No Longer Available Features Embedded Database Screen Shots Product Description Assistance Fund App offers access to information about prescription drug assistance programs and the medications supported by such programs. Programs are listed for individuals insured by private coverage, government coverage and for persons without insurance coverage. Anyone can use this friendly App to search for available assistance from The Assistance Fund or other nonprofits as well as manufacturer sponsored programs.

item.title: Homeschool Portfolio Maker
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: Homeschool Portfolio Maker iPad iTunes Link Features iCloud Storage Database Syncronization between Multiple Devices Forms In App Purchases Timed Push Notifications (Alarms) Open Library Book Search Screen Shots Product Description Thanks for downloading HPM! We’re currently working on fixing some bugs caused by iOS 9. Thanks for your patience. A new version will be available soon! Now you can keep images and videos of your child’s daily homeschool activities in one organized file.

item.title: KReady
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: K-Ready iPad & Android No Longer Available Comments Built with Game Maker Studio. I do not recommend this solution for any future products. Features Custom Keyboard 9+ Games Screen Shots Product Description The K-Ready app from the Orange County Library System (Orlando, FL) is a game that helps prepare preschoolers for kindergarten. It contains engaging and entertaining games that help preschoolers learn letters, numbers, shapes and colors.

item.title: Library Trek
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: Library Trek iPhone iTunes Link Features REST API Barcode Scanning Embedded Database Screen Shots Product Description Search your favorite library for books, DVDs, and other media. Reserve and hold items for pick-up. See what you already have on loan and renew it if you want to keep it a little longer. Found a great book at your local book store?

item.title: Meet
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: Meet iPhone No Longer Available Features Facebook Login Chat Search/Filter REST API Embedded Database Image Caching Push Notifications Screen Shots Product Description Join the Meet.com mobile social network. It’s not just dating. Instantly meet your friends from Facebook and other social networks. You can even meet new people in your area for dating, networking or just friendship. Meet.com’s app is free and easy to use.

item.title: MyATLS
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: MyATLS iPhone & iPad iTunes Link Features Forms Videos Various Calculators Lots of Written Content Customized UI Favoriting In App Purchases Screen Shots Product Description The medical care of trauma patients demands fast thinking and accurate, up-to-date resources. And there is no more reliable resource for trauma information than the American College of Surgeons (ACS). This app was developed alongside their seminal course, Advanced Trauma Life Support (ATLS).

item.title: Published Apps
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: Published Apps This is a list of Apps that I had significant involvment in ordered from newest to oldest. ScreenDoor: Who's Free to Play? Social App to help parents find kids available to play. Sighthound Live stream and notifications of surveillance software. Homeschool Portfolio Maker Create a portfolio of homeschool projects to keep notes or share online. Wine4Me A questionnaire that will give you a taste profile and suggest wine to you.

item.title: R3 App
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: R3 App iPhone & iPad iTunes Link Comments This was also not a very fun app because it was initially outsourced to china and they built the ipad version and iphone version with separate code. Nonetheless, you can take a questionnaire and see your results, find nearby shelters, access information and videos, and subscribe to a mailing list on constant contact via OAuth2. More notably the app is localized to be in spanish too, so if your phone is set to espaneol before you download the app the everything will be in spanish.

item.title: Scout
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: Scout iPhone No Longer Available Features Social Media Sharing Facebook login Search/Filter REST API Embedded Database Image Caching Push Notifications Hashtags Screen Shots Product Description SCOUT is a dynamic location scouting app with the smoothest and most effective capture, log, and delivery experience on the market. Photo, video, geotagging, and comprehensive notes are just some of the tools in what promises to be the best location scouting tool that you have ever used.

item.title: ScreenDoor
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)

item.title: Sighthound
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: Sighthound iPhone & iPad iTunes Link Features XMLRPC API Encrypted Live Video Streaming Push Notifications Screen Shots Product Description Get access to Sighthound Video remotely. Sighthound Video software has been trained to simulate the human brain’s recognition abilities. It doesn’t just detect motion like most other security software - it detects and tracks people. With this app you can view your cameras remotely, be alerted to people who have triggered rules you set, and search through clips of camera activity.

item.title: SnapShots
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: SnapShots 1.4 iPhone iTunes Link Comments This is probably one of the most prolific apps I've been involved in. It was featured on the iTunes store for 2 weeks next to Instagram. Built with love and high standards. The project took around 3 months of work, but then there was a redesign that added about 3 more months. I did most of the front end work, and this was one of the most feature rich apps I've worked on.

item.title: TypeSetter
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: TypeSetter iPhone No Longer Available Features Fonts Photo & Video Editing Social Media Sharing Screen Shots Product Description With unique filters and exclusive fonts, Typesetter will transform a regular photo into a work of art in just seconds. Send personal messages, clever memes, creative designs, or even professional announcements with coolest typography available on iOS. -Choose from a group of stylish filters.

item.title: Wine4Me
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: Wine4Me iPhone iTunes Link Features REST API Ordering Forms Internal Database Screen Shots Product Description Ready to find the right wine list for YOU? Stop drinking what everyone else says they like, drink what YOU like with Wine4.Me.

item.title: eLifeGuard
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: eLifeGuard App iPhone No Longer Available Comments This is another questionnaire app with a resource locator that uses the GPS system, but I built this one from the ground up. The only thing I didn't work on was the built-in ads. Features Forms ZipCode Based Facility Search Screen Shots Product Description Under the corporate entity Seminole Behavioral Healthcare, we have developed a unique smart phone application called eLifeGuard.

item.title: smartchoice
item.author: izackp@gmail.com (Isaac Paul)
item.description: SmartChoice Loan Calculator iPhone iTunes Link Comments This is a simply a glorified loan calculator with a news feed, contact section, and a section to see saved results. I built this app from the ground up and its also the first app I ever made. I used SQLite to save the results of the calculation, and you can even share the app through facebook, twitter, and email.
